q.p: What does my visitor function have to return? It should return a value of class CXChildVisit. This is an enumeration. It allows to terminate the traversal, traverse across the siblings and skip the childre, or to traverse the children recursively. Instead of a value of this enumeration type, you can return a logical value. If this is , we continue recursively. If this is , we end the traversal. If the function returns anything other than a logical, integer or numeric, we just asume CXChildVisit_Recurse and so continue to traverse the children recursively.
